Tomato_leaf_late_blight_00003.jpg.text: The leaf is green with a slightly wilted appearance. It has a serrated edge and a few small spots or discolorations on its surface. The veins are visible and appear to be of a lighter color. The petiole is thin and green.

Tomato_leaf_late_blight_00007.jpg.text: The leaf is green with a few spots and discolorations. The petiole is thin and green.
